nodes.text: The Heroes of Cularin was the name given to the large and disparate group of citizens of the Cularin system who were active in the years between 31 BBY and 19 BBY in defending the system. These individuals, often from humble origins, worked together to uncover untoward activities of the Metatheran Cartel, the depredations of the Navy of Thaere, and other threats to the peace and safety of Cularin.
